title: Swindon
name: Swindon Town Football Club
address: The County Ground, County Road, SN1 2ED
hours: The football season runs from August to May. Matches are usually played on a Saturday at 3pm or a Tuesday at 7:45pm
content: The local football team are known as 'The Robins' (or 'The Reds'). The club participate in League One of the English Football League hierarchy (which is two leagues below the Premier League). To fit in, wear red and occasionally voice your dislike of Oxford City F.C.
